== Cola (627022) ==
      
Cola is a village in the [[Canacona]] taluka of [[South Goa]] district with an area of 3444.1 hectares and harbouring 1107 households with total population of 5382 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[CANACONA]] is at a distance of 16 km. Male population is 2779 and female population is 2603. Scheduled Caste Population is 4 and Scheduled Tribes population is 2977. Census Location Code of the village is 627022<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
